Pre-Game Insights: Ghana coach Chris Hughton traveled with all 25 players for the match against Comoros
Ghana left it late to beat Madagascar 1-0 in their opening game, while Comoros defeated Central African Republic 4-2
Post-Match Reflections: The team will hold its first training session on Sunday, November 19, 2023, in readiness for the game on Tuesday
Others: The Black Stars have arrived in Moroni for their second Group I FIFA World Cup qualifier against Comoros on Tuesday
